description:
With Kirihara too injured to play, it falls to Ryoma to continue #1 singles. How will Ryoma fare against an opponent who has been training purely to defeat him?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nengan no Taiketsu: Ryouma vs Kevin
The Long-Awaited Game - Ryoma vs Kevin
ศึกตัดสินความแค้น เรียวมะ ปะทะ เควิน
念願の対決 リョーマVSケビン
